author: @WMCActionNews5
title: Memphis Tigers watch parties that you need to be at this Friday
text:
Memphis Tigers watch parties that you need to be at this Friday
MEMPHIS, Tenn. (WMC) - Two big-time watch parties will take place on Friday here in Memphis while the Tigers are taking on Colorado State in Seattle.
At the University of Memphis, a watch party will be held in the Plough Foundation Performance Hall inside the Scheidt Family Performing Arts Center.
Concessions will be available for purchase during the game.
Doors will open at 12:30 p.m. and the game will begin at 1 p.m.
River Madness will be a large-scale event taking place at Tom Lee Park.
From 11 a.m. to 5 p.m. big field games will be played, snacks for purchase from Hi Neighbor Cafe, local food trucks, and great views for lawn chairs and blankets.
The Sunset Canopy will be the spot for a fun Friday afternoon.
